security: Sharing the names and birthdates of dependents could put them at risk. Quoting the document: 'NAME OF DEPENDENT TO ACCOMPANY...RELATIONSHIP...DATE OF BIRTH'. This personal information could be misused.
summary: A personnel form requesting an overseas evaluation for Calvin W. Hicks, an Operations Officer, for a proposed assignment in La Paz, Bolivia, along with seven dependents, and includes their names and dates of birth.
summary_one_paragraph: This is a SECRET personnel form dated May 10, 1966, requesting an overseas evaluation for Calvin W. Hicks, an Operations Officer (GS-13) from the DDP/WH/CS/CS Dev Comp division, for a proposed assignment to La Paz, Bolivia. The form indicates that Hicks is planning to depart in September 1966, accompanied by seven dependents: his wife, Catherine L., and their children, Theresa L., Michael C., Mary C., Lisa Anne, Daniel C., and Patricia B., all of whom are listed with their dates of birth. The request, signed by Kenneth L. Wambold, includes a request to schedule a medical evaluation and notes that security approval has been granted.
title: Request for PCS Overseas Evaluation for Calvin W. Hicks
